Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to creating a community solutions matching grant program
Summary: Creates a community solutions matching grant program for proposed projects that address significant community needs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to a New York state community solutions matching grant program
